landing.title: Welcome to StoreFront
landing.description: Multi-tenant e-commerce platform. Access your store using the URL format:

store.description: Discover our amazing collection of products

emptyStore.title: Welcome to {storeName}
emptyStore.description: We're setting things up! Our store is being prepared with amazing products just for you. Check back soon!
emptyStore.footerNote: This store is currently being set up

categories.title: Shop by Collection
categories.pageDescription: Browse our complete collection of collections
categories.noResultsOnPage: No collections on this page. Please navigate to another page.

products.title: Featured Products
products.pageDescription: Browse our complete collection of products
products.noResultsOnPage: No products on this page. Please navigate to another page.
products.noReviews: No reviews yet. Be the first to share your experience!
products.commentPlaceholder: Share your experience with this product...
products.reviewPending: Your review has been submitted and is pending approval.
products.reviewSubmitError: Failed to submit review. Please try again.

quality.title: Quality Products
quality.description: We offer only the best quality products for our customers

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Quick and reliable delivery to your doorstep

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Dedicated support team ready to help you

notFound.title: Store Not Found
notFound.description: The store "{subdomain}" could not be found. Please check the URL and try again.

inactive.title: Store Unavailable
inactive.description: This store is currently inactive and not accepting orders.

network.title: Connection Error
network.description: Unable to connect to the store. Please check your internet connection and try again.

unknown.title: Something Went Wrong
unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

categories.loadFailed: Unable to load collections. Please try again later.

products.loadFailed: Unable to load products. Please try again later.

pageNotFound.title: Page Not Found
pageNotFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

storeNotFound.title: Store Not Found
storeNotFound.description: The requested store could not be found or is not available.

cart.emptyDescription: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet. Start browsing our products!
cart.someItemsOutOfStock: Some items in your cart are out of stock
cart.itemAddedToCart: {name} has been added to your cart
cart.quantityExceededDescription: Some items quantity has been adjusted due to stock changes.
cart.cartChangedDescription: Some items have been updated or removed due to availability changes.
cart.maxPerOrderExceeded: Exceeds limit of {max} per order. Please reduce quantity.

checkout.fulfillmentMethod: How would you like to receive your order?
checkout.paymentMethod: How would you like to pay?
checkout.receiptUploadLabel: Upload payment receipt (JPEG, PNG or WebP)
checkout.receiptUploadError: Failed to upload receipt. Please try again.
checkout.receiptInvalidType: Please select a JPEG, PNG or WebP image.
checkout.receiptDragDrop: Drag & drop your receipt here, or click to browse
checkout.name: Name
checkout.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
checkout.noDeliveryZones: Delivery is not available for your location yet
checkout.additionalDetailsPlaceholder: E.g., apartment number, building name, landmarks...
checkout.notesPlaceholder: Any special instructions for your order?
checkout.previewError: Failed to calculate order totals. Please try again.
checkout.orderError: Failed to place order. Please try again.
checkout.orderSuccessMessage: Thank you for your order. We'll start preparing it right away.
checkout.belowMinimumOrder: The minimum order value for this store is {minimumOrderValue}. Please add more items to proceed.
checkout.noPaymentMethodsDescription: This store is not accepting payments at the moment. Please try again later or contact the store for assistance.

orderSuccess.title: Thank You for Your Order!
orderSuccess.message: Your order has been placed successfully. We'll start preparing it right away.
orderSuccess.redirecting: Redirecting to home page in {seconds} seconds...
